title: Client Freezes in Champion Select
body: League Client has been freezing during champion select for me on league a couple of times for over 2 months now it always freezes on 0 seconds and then I Get low priority queue it isn't my net because I talk on discord and that doesn't get disconnected but only LEAGUE CLIENT ANY FIX TO THIS BECAUSE IM GETTING REALLY PISSED OFF.

replies.body:
1. Make sure your **graphics card drivers** are up to date.

2. Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

3. Try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

4. **[Update your DirectX](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/ElA0rvVL/d/HqUQBfKu)** (Never download anything DirectX related from anywhere except Microsoft).

5.  If none of that helps, **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
Hey did you get it fixed? The same thing is happening with me too and I've contacted Riot Support but nothing has fixed it yet...
